Atomic Web Design

So this is it. All the principles you need to create highly reusable, easily customizable, immensely structured code are formulated in this small talk by Brad Frost. And there is more to them than you think - Atomic Web Design is a methodology, which provides understanding of what you need to do at evey step of the development process. Definately check it out.

Death To Information Overload

Having recently watched Brad Frost's video "Death To Bullshit", I began wondering where is this all going. With such an immence amound of information being poured on us from every opportunity, what is going to happen?

While this is a very depressing issue, there are some positive insights. For example, this is a great opportunity for crafting things that just do what they must do. And, for being in a world where visiting specific websites just leaves you baffled by bullshit, this is a very effective way of helping people use tools for doing just what they need to do. Such things are bound to be shared and cherished.
